data.lyric:
[ti:Meet Me At Our Spot (Explicit)]
[ar:THE ANXIETY/WILLOW/Tyler Cole]

[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.40]Meet Me At Our Spot (Explicit) - THE ANXIETY/WILLOW/Tyler Cole
[00:01.73]Lyrics by：Willow Smith/Tyler Cole
[00:02.53]Composed by：Willow Smith/Tyler Cole
[00:03.44]Willow：
[00:03.68]
[00:19.71]When I wake up
[00:20.72]
[00:21.62]I can't even stay up
[00:23.39]
[00:24.09]I slept through the day f**k
[00:26.05]
[00:26.64]I'm not getting younger
[00:28.67]
[00:29.74]But when I'm older
[00:31.10]
[00:31.70]I'll be so much stronger
[00:34.23]I'll stay up for longer
[00:36.73]Meet me at our spot
[00:40.31]Caught a vibe
[00:41.10]
[00:41.80]Baby are you coming for the ride
[00:43.20]The ride the ride the ride
[00:44.22]I just wanna look into your eyes
[00:45.60]Your eyes your eyes
[00:46.65]I just wanna stay for the night night night
[00:50.28]When we take a drive
[00:50.91]
[00:51.62]Maybe we can hit the 405
[00:53.73]
[00:54.39]Hypnotized by the lights
[00:56.40]
[00:56.99]Man this must be the life
[00:58.18]Tyler Cole：
[00:58.49]
[01:00.15]When I go to sleep
[01:02.07]I can't even fall asleep
[01:04.54]Something's got ahold of me
[01:07.06]Feel it taking over me
[01:09.29]

[01:17.07]Meet me at our spot
[01:20.51]We caught a vibe
[01:21.23]Yeah yeah
[01:21.54]

[01:23.79]The ride the ride the ride
[01:24.83]When I look into your eyes
[01:26.35]Your eyes your eyes
[01:27.27]I just wanna hold you all night
[01:28.85]All night
[01:29.51]
[01:30.05]Maybe we can take a drive
[01:31.17]Take a drive
[01:31.55]
[01:32.12]Maybe we can hit the 405
[01:34.16]
[01:34.72]Hypnotized by the lights
[01:37.16]Man this must be the life
